name: Sky Aces
description:
Become one of the air aces of the WWI. Help allies to end a brutal and never-ending war.

Join us! Prove you're the best of the air aces!

Be ready to :
• Immerse yourself in a stylish gaming world
• Complete many exciting missions
• Fly different combat aircrafts
• Put your skills to a test with numerous achievements
• Spend a lot of battles with the aces of the world
• Immortalize your results in the game world

Good luck and have fun!
